Production Co: BUF, Dicentium Films, Break Em Films
Genre: Crime, Drama, Mystery & Thriller, Action, Comedy
Synopsis: Recently released from prison, Mark (Bradley Taylor) attempts to reconnect with his daughter and hopes to give her a Christmas to remember. Struggling to find work, he meets Alan (Cary Crankson), his former cell-mate, who encourages him to return to a life of crime. A decision made easier when Caddy (Frank Harper), a ruthless crime boss, blackmails him into doing one last job.
Title: Silent Night
